localised_description: Through his necromantic powers and whisperings on the Wind of Shyish, Nagash was able to turn this proud King.
Through his necromantic powers and whisperings on the Wind of Shyish, Nagash was able to turn this proud King.
Liche High Priest and leader of the traitors that turned to Nagash.
A tragic hero that got killed by a wicked Medusa. Now he's possessed by a spiteful spirit.
An ancient hero that couldn't prevail against a mighty Minotaur. Now he's possessed by a spiteful spirit.
When the souls are released they endeavour not to return without new victims to torment for eternity.
Long-dead destriers, awakened to serve their Unliving masters far beyond death.
The pride of Nehekharan armies, impacting enemy lines with bone-shattering force and grinding the corpses beneath their heavy wheels.
Only those who display the correct degree of diligence and reverence may learn the secrets of Unlife.
By which the very souls of the Undead can be harnessed, so their physical forms can be controlled.
Nagash is darkness and unreasoning hatred given form, the father and creator of the foul art of necromancy and lord of all Vampires.
